creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
text:
In investigating CPP tasks (cpptasks.jar-defineset class) I found non existent 
page
http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/gump/2002-06-02/ant-contrib-cpptasks.html

Where is the link for cpp tasks ???

creator: jesse@cryptocard.com
text:
The current results can be found here:
http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/gump/latest/ant-contrib.html

But I'm not sure what that is going to tell you other than that the build completed.

If you are looking for the cpp tasks (code and docs) they can be found here:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/ant-contrib/

Jesse

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
I think Jesse's information is really all you need.

ant-contrib is a project of its own.
